## Properties

| Property                          | Attribute              | Description                                                                                                                                                               | Type             | Default     |
| --------------------------------- | ---------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------- | ----------- |
| `charityLocation`                 | `charity-location`     | Charity location                                                                                                                                                          | `string`         | `undefined` |
| `charityName`                     | `charity-name`         | Charity name                                                                                                                                                              | `string`         | `undefined` |
| `charityUrl`                      | `charity-url`          | <span style="color:red">**[DEPRECATED]**</span> We should stop passing this soon, and will link to charity URLs alongside socials.<br/><br/>Link to the charity's website | `string`         | `undefined` |
| `imageAlt` _(required)_           | `image-alt`            | Alt-text for image, or null if the author has not supplied an alt-text. Should always be a string (but may be empty) when authoring new content.                          | `null \| string` | `undefined` |
| `imageHeightPercent` _(required)_ | `image-height-percent` | Image height as a percentage of width. If set used to set height in CSS without the need to wait for the image to load, avoiding layout shift further down the page.      | `null \| number` | `undefined` |
| `imageUrl`                        | `image-url`            | Full URL of a image.                                                                                                                                                      | `string`         | `''`        |
| `logoUrl`                         | `logo-url`             | Full URL of the logo.                                                                                                                                                     | `string`         | `''`        |
| `slug`                            | `slug`                 | Slug                                                                                                                                                                      | `string`         | `undefined` |
| `spaceBelow`                      | `space-below`          | Space below component                                                                                                                                                     | `number`         | `0`         |
